3D shapes
with Javascript Using Threejs

Here's a look:

This is one of my first project still in work. It is uses the threejs library to produce this torus 3D torus.

This projects end goal is to be a migration of this website using 3D shapes to make it more interactive

This was done with vanilla Javascript because I am learning javascript before I use any frameworks. I used vite with javascript, I will be making this project in to a website before I migrate this site to it.
